headline: Q4 results today: GIC, Aurobindo Pharma, Sumitomo Chemical, Nazara Tech, Sundaram Finance & Vadilal Industries on May 26
intro: Q4 results on May 26: GIC, Vadilal Industries, Aurobindo Pharma, Sumitomo Chemical, Nazara Technologies, and Blue Dart are among 205 companies to release their earnings report today.
imagecaption: Q4 results on May 26: GIC, Aurobindo Pharma, Sundaram Finance, Sumitomo Chemical, Bayer Cropscience, Nazara Technologies, Gillette, and Blue Dart are among 205 companies to release their earnings report today.

headline: Sun Pharma share price falls over 4% after Q4 results. Should you buy, hold or sell?
intro: Sun Pharma share price has fallen over 7% in one month and more than 12% YTD. However, over the past one year, Sun Pharma shares have rallied 11% and have jumped 80% in three years. The pharma stock has delivered multibagger returns of 254% in the past five years.
imagecaption: Sun Pharma share price has delivered multibagger returns of 254% in the past five years.

headline: Sun Pharma to ramp up growth-boosting specialty portfolio in FY26
intro: The company projects revenue growth of mid- to high single digits in FY26 compared with an 8.5% increase in FY25
imagecaption: Sun Pharmaceutical plans to invest an additional $100 million on the commercialization of its new specialty product pipeline in the US. (Mint)

headline: Sun Pharma Q4 Results: Profit declines 19% YoY; declares dividend of  ?5.50
intro: Sun Pharma Q4 Results: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries reported a 19% YoY decline in Q4FY25 profit at  ?2,153.93 crore. However, total revenue rose 8% YoY to  ?12,958.84 crore, and EBITDA increased 22% to  ?3,716 crore.
imagecaption: Sun Pharma Q4 Results: Sun Pharma's consolidated profit declined 19% YoY to  ?2,153.93 crore.

headline: LTIMindtree bags its largest deal from US agribusiness firm ADM
intro: The $450 mn deal is also the second instance of an Indian software services provider, earning between $1 bn and $5 bn in annual revenue, bagging its largest contract in less than three months.
